name: Arcana Force 0 - The Fool
text: This card cannot be destroyed by battle. This card cannot be changed to Defense Position, except with a card effect. When this card is Summoned: Toss a coin and gain the appropriate effect. â—? Heads: Negate your card effects that target this card, and destroy them. â—? Tails: Negate your opponent's card effects that target this card, and destroy them.
